This widget visualizes a G-code file and: This widget visualizes a G-code file and simulates the tool path.
This widget lets you establish a connect: This widget lets you establish a connection to a serial port.
This widget lets you read and write data: This widget lets you read and write data to the CNC controller connected to a serial port.
This widget shows the Grbl state and pro: This widget shows the Grbl state and provides Grbl specific features.
This widget shows the Smoothie state and: This widget shows the Smoothie state and provides Smoothie specific features.
This widget shows the TinyG state and pr: This widget shows the TinyG state and provides TinyG specific features.
This widget shows the XYZ position. It i: This widget shows the XYZ position. It includes jog controls, homing, and axis zeroing.
This widget shows the current status of: This widget shows the current status of G-code commands.
This widget allows you control laser int: This widget allows you control laser intensity and turn the laser on/off.
This widget can use macros to automate r: This widget can use macros to automate routine tasks.
This widget helps you use a touch plate: This widget helps you use a touch plate to set your Z zero offset.
This widget provides the spindle control: This widget provides the spindle control.
This widget gives you a communication in: This widget gives you a communication interface for creating your own widget.
This widget lets you monitor a webcam.
